name: Ronin - prologue
description:
RONIN

Rōnin is an action-adventure game in pixel art stylistic.

The action takes place on the island of exiles in Japan, where the ronin path begins.

Travel the open world, explore the stunning views of the island, take part in samurai fights and just enjoy the atmosphere of Japan.

Game is in development and release is planned on June 17 of 2020.

Soundtrack by - Rata Atar
